itunes:title: Episode 450 - DB Sports Companion Show 07/16/19 - Soooo Close To Football Season
title: Episode 450 - DB Sports Companion Show 07/16/19 - Soooo Close To Football Season
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Russell Westbrook getting traded to the Houston Rockets and what it means for Chris Paul, the Anahiem Angels throwing a no hitter on Tyler Skaggs night, will Rory McIlroy win the British open, the Joker vs Federer ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Russell Westbrook getting traded to the Houston Rockets and what it means for Chris Paul, the Anahiem Angels throwing a no hitter on Tyler Skaggs night, will Rory McIlroy win the British open, the Joker vs Federer being the greatest Wimbledon final ever, and we take questions from the audience live on air including how to bet.
